item.title: Plugin with id 'com.github.dcendents.android-maven-plugin' not found
item.description: Problem Plugin with id ‘com.github.dcendents.android-maven-plugin’ not found Fix buildscript { repositories { jcenter() } dependencies { classpath 'com.github.dcendents:android-maven-gradle-plugin:1.5' classpath 'com.jfrog.bintray.gradle:gradle-bintray-plugin:1.7.3' } } apply plugin: 'com.android.library' apply plugin: 'com.android.library' apply plugin: 'com.github.dcendents.android-maven' apply plugin: 'com.github.dcendents.android-maven' apply plugin: 'com.jfrog.bintray' apply plugin: 'com.jfrog.bintray'
